code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/sam/Documents/CakeProject/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{SELECTED_MESH_MATERIAL,SET_CURRENT_MATERIAL_DATA}from"../StoreConstants";const initialState={currentMaterialData:null,selectedMeshMaterial:null};const MaterialReducer=function MaterialReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_CURRENT_MATERIAL_DATA:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{currentMaterialData:action.payload});case SELECTED_MESH_MATERIAL:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{selectedMeshMaterial:action.payload});default:{return _objectSpread({},state);}}};export default MaterialReducer;
